definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1" else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">[§5Великий дух (Богиня смерти)§f] - Продолжай, ты почти у цели!</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">[§5Великий дух (Богиня смерти)§f] - Дракон слабеет, я чувствую это.</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">[§5Великий дух (Богиня смерти)§f] - Пусть ящерица знает своё место!</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
